availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, merchant. Kentucky native. Married to Louisa Elliott. Father of William Elliott, Henry Elliott, Nathan Elliott, Elizabeth Elliott, and ZackAnn Elliott. Married to Emely Elliott. Merchant in Ballard County in 1850 and 1860. Owned five enslaved persons in 1850 and 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, p. 305. Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Blandville, p. 2. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, Blandville, p. 1.
